Call Horror:Unknown Effect 126 (-6)?
The caster sacrifices human blood to attract a few Lesser Horrors. Horrors will feed off the fear and suffering of dying soldiers and will continue to attack until everyone is slain. The horror will appear at the edge of the battlefield.
